p: According to Table 9, the highest number of mold and yeast counts (1.9 × 10 3±5 × 10 CFU/g) was measured in the control treatment. With increasing the concentrations of extracts and essential oils, the mold and yeast count of probiotic yogurts decreased. The lowest (1.8 × 10 2±3 × 10 CFU/g) mold and yeast counts were measured in probiotic yogurts containing 0.4% FAEE.
